name: starter-npm
description: A project starter using only npm scripts

scripts.js:dev: watchify -d -t babelify -t aliasify -t stringify -g glslify app/scripts/app.js -o public/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.js:build: browserify -t babelify -t aliasify -t stringify -g glslify app/scripts/app.js | uglifyjs -o public/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run styles:dev & npm run js:dev & npm run browsersync
scripts.build: npm run styles:build & npm run js:build & npm run browsersync

author: Jeremie Drazic
